original_text: Then the Spirit of the Lord came on me, and he told me to say: “This is what the Lord says: That is what you are saying, you leaders in Israel, but I know what is going through your mind.
korean_text: 여호와의 영이 내게 임하여 이르시되 너는 말하기를 여호와의 말씀에 이스라엘 족속아 너희가 이렇게 말하였도다 너희 마음에서 일어나는 것을 내가 다 아노라

sentences.original_text: Then the Spirit of the Lord came on me,
and he told me to say:
This is what the Lord says:
That is what you are saying,
but I know what is going through your mind.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 너희 마음속에서 무엇이 지나가는지 알고 있습니다.
